issue.title: [CF 721] Script ran too long
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.  Use my profile
2.  Enter in combat with a mob
3.  Not happening everytime, thus i can't figure out what's wrong
4. Happened only while Brewmaster, didn't happen (or coincidence) while WindWalker

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v6.1.2 r684

Do you have an error log of what happened?

comments.body:
I added some functionality in r685 that should at least prevent things from actually breaking when this happens. The errors will still happen, unfortunately.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

can you tell me which of the auras is causing the error? i know i did something a little complicated with all those conditions and checks :P


> Posted by CurseForge user sontix

It is almost certainly coming from all your groups being set to always show in combat. Which, actually, as I just typed that out, I got an idea about how to fix it.

More about the issue: when a group is shown or hidden, it takes a ton of CPU time. When 9 groups do this at once, combined with a slow CPU and/or GPU, it can take too long and Blizzard stops the execution through their new throttling system.

I will look into the issue more in the coming days and see if I can figure out how to fix it using the idea that popped into my mind.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
